about_the_game:
"This crypt is full of treasure."



As you travel through different biomes while descending deeper and deeper into The Crypt of Treasure, you will be challenged by enemies ranging from rancid rats to dust-spawned monsters. While making important decisions with every step, looking out for loot and potential traps will be the key to your survival.
The variety of weapons that can be found, or sometimes purchased, are sure to have unique special abilities that can fit into many different playstyles and alter gameplay in many ways, which combined with the procedural, rouge-like nature of the game provides high replay value.

Do you have what it takes to deal with the pressure of making difficult choices that could either result in your doom or bless you with treasures of incomprehensible power?



You play as a miner who is looking deep underground for a mythical crypt that is rumoured to be full of treasure. But instead, he uncovers an ancient dungeon that contains unnerving foes and deadly traps. Is this what he was looking for? Too late. As soon as he steps in, he realises the dungeon is cursed; there is no going back now; the paths continue to branch, and there appears to be no end. The only way to go is forward...



• Procedurally generated endless rooms and items.

• A whole load of enemies with distinct mechanics.

• Non-diagonal movement for a retro feel and unique combat.

• Fast-moving combat focused on high-risk, high-reward scenarios.

• Branching pathways which have to be chosen wisely in order to not die.

• Platforming or puzzle rooms, which offer a change of pace but still test your skill.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8300 @ 2.83GHz or AMD A10 PRO-7800B APU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200 or AMD RADEON 9550
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The Crypt of Treasure is an endless, procedurally generated dungeon crawler focused on fast-paced and intense combat, loads of content and unique weapons to match your playstyle, and a gameplay loop with high replay value that rewards you for making difficult decisions.
